docs.snippet: LEAD: Even though Carla A. Hills, the United States Trade Representative, finds the idea of managed trade repugnant, she has a number of outside advisers, principally from the business community, who argue that the closed nature of Japan's economy...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: Even though Carla A. Hills, the United States Trade Representative, finds the idea of managed trade repugnant, she has a number of outside advisers, principally from the business community, who argue that the closed nature of Japan's economy thwarts classical free-trade solutions for correcting trade imbalances.

byline.original: By CLYDE H. FARNSWORTH, Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: LEAD:  International A3-19  East Germany ended limits on travel and emigration yesterday, and thousands of East Germans swarmed across the Berlin wall in a mass celebration of freedom. Page A1  East Berliners of all ages, and from every way of life,...
docs.lead_paragraph: LEAD: International A3-19 East Germany ended limits on travel and emigration yesterday, and thousands of East Germans swarmed across the Berlin wall in a mass celebration of freedom. Page A1 East Berliners of all ages, and from every way of life, walked, biked and drove to crossing points in the wall last night, entering the western half of the city that they could previously only gaze at.
